DOC.brief_title: Combivir And Maraviroc In Antiretroviral Naive Subjects In Russia
DOC.criteria: Over 18 year age . R5 HIV infection screen tropism test . Viral load > 1,000 copies/mL . Never previously treat antiHIV medicine . Previously treat antiHIV medicine . Hepatitis B coinfection .
